entry.title: SVM-RFE
entry.content:
SVM-RFE的过程包括四个步骤：训练分类器，根据排列准则计算每个特征的地位，除去排在末位的特征，也就是除去最不相关的特征。

伪代码描述如下

  1. 输入和输出
    (1)Inputs:
    Training examples
    $$ X_0 = [x_1, x_2, \cdots x_k, \cdots x_l] $$
    Class labels
    $$ y = [y_1, y_2, \cdots y_k, \cdots y_l] $$
    (2)Output:
    Feature ranked list $ r $.
  2. 初始化
    (1)Surviving features
    $$ s = [1, 2, … n] $$
    (2)Feature ranked list
    $$ r = [ ] $$
  3. 计算
    Repeat until s = [ ]
    X = X0(:, s)model = SVM-train(X, y) Rank(i) =  RankCriterion(model.aplha, X)f = argmin(Rank)r = [s(f), r]s = s(1:f-1, f+1:length(s))
    End
    In this,for SVM-RFE with a linear kernel function $ Rank(i) = \sum_{i=1}^{m}(α_iy_ix_i)^2) $ for SVM-RFE with a nonlinear kernel function $ Rank(i) = \frac{1}{2}α‘Qα − \frac{1}{2}α‘Q(−i)α $;
    $ α $ is the coefficient vector，and the $ Q(−i) $ means the matrix without the ith feature
    This equation is based on the assumption that α is unchanged when the ith feature is eliminated,
entry.summary: 当一个数据集特征数较多时，分类变得困难并且精度降低，所以我们需要提取其中的关键特征，所以我们学习了SVM-RFE这一特征提取及分类的方法，这种方法是基于递归功能消除的SVM，其目的是减少特征空间维度，并逐一消除最不相关的功能。
